Magazine covers can serve as temporary, cost-effective covers for scrapbooking, card-making, or gift wrapping.
Magazines can be used as a creative teaching tool to help children develop reading skills or for language learning practice.
Shallow dish, small box, magazine holder can be used to keep books, notebooks, or small electronics organized and easily accessible.
Magazine pages can be used as a decorative background for origami or paper crafting projects.
Magazines can be used to make unique wall art or collage by cutting out images and arranging them into a visual composition.
